step1.sentence: After years of hard work and dedication, she finally managed to achieve success in her career as a software engineer.

step2.story: Mark had been running his small bakery for five years without much profit. He refused to give up, experimenting with new recipes and building a loyal customer base. When a food magazine featured his shop, he knew he had finally achieved success.

step3.story: Lisa stared at the rejection letter from yet another publisher. It was the fourteenth one this year, and doubt was creeping in. But she remembered her grandmother's words: nothing worth having comes easy. She revised her manuscript one more time, pouring her heart into every chapter. Six months later, a small publishing house offered her a deal. Standing in the bookstore, holding her printed novel, Lisa realized that achieving success was never about the destination — it was about refusing to quit.

meaning.literalMeaningKo: '성공을 달성하다'라는 뜻으로, achieve는 노력 끝에 무언가를 이루다, success는 성공을 의미합니다.
meaning.realUsageKo: 단순히 운이 좋아서가 아니라, 오랜 노력과 인내 끝에 목표를 이루었을 때 주로 사용합니다. 커리어, 학업, 사업 등 다양한 분야에서 쓰입니다.
meaning.etymologyKo: achieve는 고대 프랑스어 achever(끝내다, 완성하다)에서 유래했고, success는 라틴어 successus(좋은 결과)에서 왔습니다. 합쳐서 '노력의 결실을 맺다'라는 의미를 갖습니다.
meaning.nuanceKo: achieve success는 격식 있는 표현으로 에세이, 연설, 비즈니스 맥락에서 자주 쓰입니다. 일상 대화에서는 'make it'이나 'do well'이 더 자연스럽습니다.
meaning.shortExampleEn: You can achieve success if you stay focused and never give up.
meaning.shortExampleKo: 집중력을 잃지 않고 포기하지 않으면 성공을 이룰 수 있습니다.
